page.title: 20Introducing the Writers
page.content: Much of the work in this survey has been done by the children and teachers of Creeting St. Mary V.A.P. School, helped by kind people from the village. The children will now tell you about their school. "Our school is 114 years old. We have 39 children, 23 in the Juniors and 16 in the Infants. The youngest is 5 and the oldest is 9.There are two teachers." "Our school has a pointed roof. This makes things echo when you sing, it sounds lovely." "Behind the infants' mobile classroom is a little swimming pool and a field with a walnut tree that bends over because the west wind blows it." "We have apple trees with juicy fruit." "The bell has a nest in it." "I like this school."
